summary: An abstract method with the purpose of drawing the asset to the [Layer](/documentation/Layer) that the owning [Entity](/documentation/Entity) exists on.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The [Entity](/documentation/Entity) that the asset being drawn should represent.

remarks: No implementation is present for this method and must be implemented in classes which derive from Asset.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
